values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Don't waste your time in anger, regrets, worries and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy

values.title: Jos Saramago
values.desc: If I'm sincere today, what does it matter if I regret it tomorrow?

values.title: Shannon L Alder
values.desc: One of the greatest regrets in life is being what others would want you to be rather than being yourself

values.title: Charles Dickens
values.desc: There was a long hard time when I kept far from me the remembrance of what I had thrown away when I was quite ignorant of its worth

values.title: Arthur Miller
values.desc: Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets

values.title: Mercedes Lackey
values.desc: If only. Those must be the two saddest words in the world

values.title: Jonathan Safran Foer
values.desc: The mistakes I've made are dead to me But I cant take back the things I never did

values.title: Nina LaCour
values.desc: There are so many things that I want so badly to tell you but I just cant

values.title: Nina LaCour
values.desc: You might be looking for reasons but there are no reasons
